Package com.fssa.projectprovision.validation

Class MilestoneValidator

java.lang.Object
com.fssa.projectprovision.validation.MilestoneValidator
public class MilestoneValidator extends Object
* A utility class for validating Milestone objects. This class provides methods to validate various attributes of a Milestone object. Usage: Milestone milestone = ...; // Get a Milestone object to validate MilestoneValidator validator = new MilestoneValidator(milestone); boolean isValid = validator.validateTaskText(milestone.getTaskText()); // Perform similar validation for other attributes
Author:
JayaprakashJaisankar
